level.text: Based on information provided pursuant to Sections 6118, 6119, and 6200 the rent charged shall be the lesser of:
A fixed amount determined by DCHA for the Development (“market-based rent”) pursuant to Subsection 6200.1(b);
An amount based on a percentage of household income pursuant to Subsection 6200.1(a); or
$0, for families which DCHA has determined do not have any adjusted income, as defined in Subsection 6099.1, as determined by DCHA at certification or recertification.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 48 DCR 9814 (October 26, 2001); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 54 DCR 012309 (December 21, 2007).
